The claim is attributed to Alex Jones: a pro-Trump conspiracy theorist who runs InfoWars.com.
Alex Jones disputed the claim made by Hi: stating that he has never said that the victims of the Sandy Hook massacre were child actors or that no one was actually killed there.
Clinton: s campaign provided a backup for their claim, quoting a June 23, 2016, story in the New Yorker magazine that mentioned Jones historically insisting that no one was actually hurt at Sandy Hook and that they were actors.
The Texas Truth: O-Meter was used to fact-check Clinton's statement and determine the authenticity of the claim.
